Hey! I was wondering if anybody has any tips for optimizing Cad in Onshape.
Thanks!

From earlier this year:

Onshape Performance Presentation from NE Mentor Conference Technical
I gave a presentation at the New England Mentor Conference about Onshape Best Practices with a heavy focus on improving performance in Part Studios and Assemblies. I got around to cleaning it up and wanted to put it out for more teams to use. The performance recommendations are informed from conversations I‚Äôve had while working here at PTC. Onshape Best Practices for FRC Hopefully some of this is useful!
